dc:title: Fall Appeal - October/November 1975
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Speaks of loneliness and how community dispels it, even though quarrels sometimes erupt. Explains where the title of her autobiography, The Long Loneliness, came from.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 564 1975-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
